name: Zap2it.com
overview: Zap2it is produced by Tribune Media Services (TMS), a business unit of the Chicago-based Tribune Company. TMS is a leading provider of TV, movie and celebrity information to thousands of media, software and consumer electronics companies serving millions of entertainment fans daily. Some of the top-tier clients include TiVo, Microsoft, Comcast, DISH Network, MobiTV and the New York Times. When you use online listings, an on-screen program guide or a printed guide to get TV or movie info, it’s likely you’re looking at TMS data.
